txt.en: 'Oh that sets my heart at ease. Thank you, traveller.'
A farmer asks you to help protect Lothgobel by fighting off wild boars.
Tell Alagiel that you have culled some boars.
'Vicious boars have been attacking my poor animals! Please do what you can to reduce their numbers.'
Alagiel has asked you to defeat vicious boars near Lothgobel.
